item.title: 2 Drains in the road have sunk significantly and tarmac broken away, 22nd December
item.description:
2 Drains in the road have sunk significantly and tarmac broken away - very dangerous. The drains are around 2 metres from each other on the same side of the road - heading into st Mary cray towards nugent. Approximate what 3 words location is rash.cycles.awake
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 191, High Street, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Abandoned vehicle parked dangerously obstructing traffic, 22nd December
item.description:
This car has been dumped or abandoned by the mechanic opposite number 96 Riverdale Road London SE18 1PB. He has at least 10 cars parked on this road, dumped for over a year in some cases. What is being done about this?? Ive reported these cases for months but nothing is being done. Should I call the police?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Riverdale Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
